ModMetaData.name: LMC001.壁挂式照明灯
ModMetaData.author: Murmur
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Adds a light that is placed directly on walls. By default the light uses less power but also provides less light than the standard standing lamp. 添加直接放置在墙上的照明灯。默认情况下，灯消耗的功率较小，但提供的光也比标准灯少。
